Question
========

In linear regression analyses, parameters are estimated using the *lower squares method*. What is the premise of this metode? 
Answerlist
----------
* Minimize $\sum{(\hat{y}-\overline{y})^{2}}$
* Minimize $\sum{(\hat{y}-\overline{y})}$
* Minimize $\sum{(y-\overline{y})^{2}}$
* Minimize $\sum{(y-\hat{y})^{2}}$

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
